item.title: The Utility of a Modular Framework: Evaluating Mosaic for Game Development
item.description: In this graduate thesis a taxonomy for Mosaic, along with select Character Controllers and Ability Systems, is presented contributing to an understanding of how modular design impacts production.

item.title: Animations Driving the Game Simulation
item.description: This paper analyzes animation pipelines within various engines and explores how animation driven game simulations impact development.

item.title: Dark Souls UI Analysis
item.description: This visual analysis of the UI of Dark Souls 3 highlights how it’s design reflects the game’s overarching themes and contributes to a positive user experience.
